title: Sure, here's a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that focus on multimodal entailment and the semantic alignment of documents from different modalities
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** - Tadas Baltru≈°aitis, Chaitanya Ahuja, Louis-Philippe Morency
A comprehensive survey on multimodal machine learning, covering various tasks including entailment and alignment
**"Visual Semantic Role Labeling: A Benchmark for Image and Video Scene Understanding"**
Discusses the alignment of visual and textual information for semantic understanding
**"Aligning Books and Movies: Towards Story-like Visual Explanations by Watching Movies and Reading Books"** - Zhu, Lin, et al
Explores the alignment between textual narratives and visual content in movies
**"Learning to Compose Neural Networks for Question Answering"**
Focuses on multimodal entailment in the context of question answering
**"Deep Visual-Semantic Alignments for Generating Image Descriptions"**
Discusses the alignment of visual data with textual descriptions

author.literal: **"Multimodal Neural Machine Translation"** - Specia, Lucia, et al.

title: Examines the translation of text with the help of visual context
**"Unifying Visual-Semantic Embeddings with Multimodal Neural Language Models"** - Kiros, Ryan, et al
Investigates the embedding of visual and textual data into a unified space
**"From Recognition to Cognition: Visual Commonsense Reasoning"**
Explores the reasoning over visual and textual data
**"Image-Text Embedding Learning via Visual and Textual Semantic Reasoning"** - Li, Kunpeng, et al
Focuses on embedding learning for multimodal data
**"VisualBERT: A Simple and Performant Baseline for Vision and Language"** - Li, Liunian Harold, et al
Introduces a model for joint vision and language understanding
Learning Cross-Modality Encoder Representations from Transformers"**
Discusses a transformer-based model for cross-modal understanding
**"ViLBERT: Pretraining Task-Agnostic Visiolinguistic Representations for Vision-and-Language Tasks"** - Lu, Jiasen, et al
Focuses on pretraining models for vision and language tasks
UNiversal Image-TExt Representation Learning"** - Chen, Yen-Chun, et al
Presents a model for learning universal representations for image and text
**"Visual Entailment: A Novel Task for Fine-Grained Image Understanding"** - Xie, Ning, et al
Introduces the task of visual entailment for image understanding
**"Image-Text Retrieval Using Multi-Modal Neural Networks"** - Wang, Liwei, et al
Discusses retrieval tasks using multimodal neural networks
**"Multimodal Transformer for Unaligned Multimodal Language Sequences"** - Tsai, Yao-Hung Hubert, et al
Explores transformers for unaligned multimodal sequences
**"Aligning Visual Regions and Textual Concepts for Semantic-Grounded Image Representations"** - Zhang, Hanwang, et al
Focuses on aligning visual regions with textual concepts
**"Visual Semantic Parsing by Learning Across Vision and Language"** - Shi, Baoxiong, et al
Discusses semantic parsing using both vision and language
**"Cross-Modal Relationship Inference for Generating Image Descriptions"** - Yao, Ting, et al
Examines the inference of relationships across modalities for image description
**"Multimodal Fusion for Video Retrieval with Multiple Queries"** - Otani, Mayu, et al
Focuses on multimodal fusion techniques for video retrieval
These articles cover a range of topics within multimodal entailment and semantic alignment, providing a broad perspective on the challenges and solutions in this field
